title: Yep, ghost definitely needs that nerf on pbe...

I see so many annies, viktors, luxs, twisted fates, aurelion sols, syndras, ahris running it, and they are so dominant with the pressure it gives (FYI, these are the only mid laners i ever see)

Looking at the statistics, it is indeed a popular summoner. However, it doesn't correlate to a huge or noticeable winrate increase in comparison to the alternative summoners. I believe that to encourage other summoners we'd have to buff ignite, cleanse, and barrier, instead of nerfing ghost. And if we must nerf ghost, nerf it for ranged champions.
look up, i said this already, and actually, annie has the highest win rate in mid lane when using ghost at nearly 57%
